entry.title: 4 Armenian villages completely isolated as Azerbaijan installs new checkpoint

media:group.media:title: 4 Armenian villages completely isolated as Azerbaijan installs new checkpoint
media:group.media:description:
Azerbaijani border guards moved on Sunday to block the Hakari bridge, which lies within the Lachin corridor close to the border with Armenia, and set up a checkpoint there, dramatically escalating tensions in the region. Armenia decried the move as a gross violation of the ceasefire that ended the 2020 war in and around Nagorno-Karabakh.
Credits: Ruptly

entry.title: ยซีีธีฌีซีฃึีกึีซยป ีคีฅีบึีซ ีธึ ีฉีดึีกีดีธีฌีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีคีฅีด ีบีกีตึีกึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถโค ีฆึีธึีตึ ยซีีซีกีฝีซีถ ีฏีกึีธีฒ ีฅีถึยป ีิฟ ีฒีฅีฏีกีพีกึีซ ีฐีฅีฟ

media:group.media:title: ยซีีธีฌีซีฃึีกึีซยป ีคีฅีบึีซ ีธึ ีฉีดึีกีดีธีฌีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีคีฅีด ีบีกีตึีกึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถโค ีฆึีธึีตึ ยซีีซีกีฝีซีถ ีฏีกึีธีฒ ีฅีถึยป ีิฟ ีฒีฅีฏีกีพีกึีซ ีฐีฅีฟ
media:group.media:description:
ยซีีซีกีฝีซีถ ีฏีกึีธีฒ ีฅีถึยป ีฐีกีฝีกึีกีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฒีฅีฏีกีพีกึ ีีธึีฆีกีถีถีก ิตึีฅีดีตีกีถีจ ีกีฝีธึีด ีง, ีธึ ีฉีดึีกีดีธีฌีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฟีกึีกีฎีดีกีถ ีพีฟีกีถีฃีจ ีดีฅีฎ ีง ีกีฏีธึีดีขีถีฅึีธึีด ีธึ ีชีกีดีกีถึีซ ีถีดีกีถึ ึีซีถีกีฏ ีกีตีฌ ีฐีกีฝีฟีกีฟีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีธึีดึ ีึีก ีญีธีฝึีธีพี ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด ีถีกึ ีฌีกีตีถ ีฉีกึ ีฅีถ ีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด ีกีผึีกีถึ ยซีถีกึีฏีธีทีธึีฅึีจยป, ีธึีธีถึ ีคีฅีด ีบีกีตึีกึีจ ีขีกีพีกีฏีกีถ ีขีกึีค ีงึ ิธีฝีฟ ีฃีฌีญีกีพีธึ ีคีกีฟีกีญีกีฆีซ 2022-ีซ ีฐีกีฒีธึีคีดีกีถี ีถีกีญีธึีค ีฟีกึีซ ีกีณีฅีฌ ีฅีถ ีฉีดึีกีดีซีปีธึีถีฅึีซ ีทึีปีกีถีกีผีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีคีฅีบึีฅึีจโค 2021-ีซีถ ีฃึีกีถึีพีฅีฌ ีง 974, ีซีฝีฏ 2022-ีซีถี 1 717 ีคีฅีบึึ

entry.title: โTurkey spends billions on global Armenian Genocide denial campaignโ - A talk with Suren Manukyan

media:group.media:title: โTurkey spends billions on global Armenian Genocide denial campaignโ - A talk with Suren Manukyan
media:group.media:description:
Suren Manukyan, the Head of the Department of Comparative Genocide Studies at the Armenian Genocide Museum and Institute, sat down with CivilNetโs Emilio Cricchio to discuss how the 2020 Nagorno-Karabakh war and its aftermath have affected the Armenian peopleโs perception and attitude toward the genocide. Manukyan also talked about why the Turkish state pursues such a well-funded and aggressive policy of genocide denial.

entry.title: Business Week Armenia: Government expands tax breaks for IT sector

media:group.media:title: Business Week Armenia: Government expands tax breaks for IT sector
media:group.media:description:
In this weekโs edition of CivilNetโs business digest:
๐The government approved plans to expand a scheme providing tax breaks for IT firms, bringing the total amount of pledged support under that program to nearly $16.5 million. ๐Wine exports soared to nearly $36.5 million last year, with about 80% of the exports destined for Russia, while the number of winemaking companies rose to 150. ๐A government watchdog fined three dairy producers a total of about $33,000 for anticompetitive practices, amid talks over Russiaโs ban on Armenian dairy products.
